definitions.definition: Tending to ask questions , or to want to explore or investigate ; inquisitive ; ( with a negative connotation ) nosy , prying .
examples: Young children are naturally curious about the world and everything in it.

definitions.definition: Leading one to ask questions about; somewhat odd , out of the ordinary , or unusual .
examples: The platypus is a curious creature, with fur like a mammal and a beak like a bird.

definitions.definition: ( in combination ) Interested in entering a romantic or sexual relationship with a specified group.
( obsolete ) Careful , fastidious , particular ; ( specifically ) demanding a high standard of excellence , difficult to satisfy .
( obsolete ) Carefully or artfully constructed ; made with great elegance or skill .

main_definition: Tending to ask questions , or to want to explore or investigate ; inquisitive ; ( with a negative connotation ) nosy , prying .

( obsolete ) Carefully or artfully constructed ; made with great elegance or skill .

definitions.definition: Containing or pertaining to trivalent curium .

main_definition: ( inorganic chemistry , rare ) Containing or pertaining to trivalent curium .
